mapper.select: SELECT A.POST_ID , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_DELETE_DATE , A.MEMBER_ID , A.COURSE_ID , A.IS_POST_PUBLIC , A.MEMBER_COUNT FROM POST A
SELECT A.POST_ID , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_DELETE_DATE , A.MEMBER_ID , A.COURSE_ID , A.IS_POST_PUBLIC , A.MEMBER_COUNT FROM POST A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT A.POST_ID , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_DELETE_DATE , A.MEMBER_ID , A.COURSE_ID , A.IS_POST_PUBLIC , A.MEMBER_COUNT FROM POST A WHERE A.POST_ID = #{postId}
SELECT A.POST_ID , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_DELETE_DATE , A.MEMBER_ID , A.COURSE_ID , A.IS_POST_PUBLIC , A.MEMBER_COUNT FROM POST A WHERE A.IS_POST_PUBLIC = #{postStatus}
SELECT A.POST_ID , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_DELETE_DATE , A.MEMBER_ID , A.COURSE_ID , A.IS_POST_PUBLIC , A.MEMBER_COUNT FROM POST A WHERE A.MEMBER_COUNT = #{memberCount}
SELECT B.POST_HASHTAG_ID , A.POST_ID , C.HASHTAG_TITLE FROM POST A JOIN POST_HASHTAG B ON B.POST_ID = A.POST_ID JOIN HASHTAG C ON C.HASHTAG_ID = B.HASHTAG_ID WHERE A.POST_ID = #{postId}
SELECT A.POST_LIKE_ID , A.MEMBER_ID , A.POST_ID FROM POST_LIKE A WHERE A.POST_ID = #{postId}
